features: PREMIUM COMFORTFOAM MEMORY FOAM: Our foot stool under desk features dense memory foam that provides unrivaled comfort to soothe and rejuvenate your tired and aching feet, helping to keep you comfortable all day long

ERGONOMIC TEARDROP DESIGN FOR EFFECTIVE PAIN RELIEF: Our under desk footrest helps with discomfort in your feet, legs, lower back, knees, and hips, letting you achieve peak performance while reducing pressure caused by hard floors

OPTIMAL SUPPORT FOR IMPROVED CIRCULATION: Our office footrest under desk is designed to encourage proper circulation by lifting your feet and legs off hard surfaces and edges. Our footrest is your essential comfort companion
SUPPORTS PROPER POSTURE: By keeping your feet elevated, our ergonomic foot rest makes it easier to maintain proper posture, reducing strain on your back, and encouraging healthier sitting habits

USE AS A FOOT REST OR LEG ROCKER: Enjoy the dual purpose functionality of our foot rest for under desk at work. Use it traditionally or flip it over for a gentle rocking motion, perfect for keeping your legs active during extended sitting periods

SOFT, VELVETY COVER & NON-SLIP BOTTOM: Our foot pillow offers a gentle touch that feels great with or without shoes, and is tough enough to withstand daily use. The non-slip bottom eliminates slipping to provide reliable support

THE PERFECT SIZE FOR ALL: With dimensions of 17"" x 5"" x 10"", our under desk foot stool is just the right size to fit under any desk or table, making it easy to incorporate into your workspace or relaxation zone without any hassle

USE IT ANYWHERE YOU SIT: From home offices to gaming sessions, work environments to study nooks, our leg rest under desk is a must in work from home accessories. The perfect addition to every space, ensuring total comfort at all times

LIFETIME REPLACEMENT POLICY: Your satisfaction is our priority. That's why we offer a lifetime replacement policy. If you experience any issues with our office foot rest, we'll replace it for you, ensuring you always have the best support

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kick Up Your Feet and Relax with the Everlasting Comfort Under Desk Footrest With the Everlasting Comfort foot rest cushion, you can sit comfortably while working, gaming, studying, or traveling. Made with 100 percent premium memory foam, the desk foot rest provides lower body support. Use it as an under desk foot stool or flip it over and use as a rocking foot rest.

Foot Stool Under Desk Made with 100 percent heat responsive memory foam, the small foot rest provides cloud-like comfort to effectively relieve pressure and pain Home Office Foot Rest Sitting at your desk for 8+ hours while working, studying, or gaming puts unwanted strain on your lower body. Use the computer desk foot rest to lift your feet into alignment for improved posture Under Desk Leg Rest With the office footrest, it supports and cushions in a way that flooring alone just can't. This helps to enhance circulation and overall leg and foot comfort

Multifunctional Memory Foam Foot Rest That Meets All Your Needs Use the ergo foot rest while working or simply during your leisure time. Can be placed under your feet, ankles, and knees, or flipped over and rocked to provide a bit of exercise while sitting. Lightweight and portable, bring with you wherever you go to ensure your feet are always rested.

Previous page Foam Foot Rest Memory foam gently yields to your feet for personalized support, regaining its shape after each use Ergonomic Foot Rest Designed with a unique tear drop shape, it fits feet arches perfectly to relieve & refresh sore feet Under Desk Footrest With the non-slip rubber bottom, you can use it on hard wood, tile, and carpets without any shifting Desk Foot Stool Easily unzip and remove the cover. Wash on the gentle cycle, then tumble dry with low or no heat Next page Crafted with the Highest Quality Materials and Standards to Deliver a Truly Superior Footrest 1 Premium Memory Foam 2 Teardrop Shaped 3 Non-Slip Bottom 4 Machine Washable

Certified Safe Rocking Foot Rest Sourced and designed with premium materials and tested rigorously, our sitting foot rest has met and exceeded standards in safety and quality. From Our Customers Footrest for under desk is: 500+ Very Comfortable All Day100+ Definitely Recommend500+ Perfect for Work/Desk

What are the benefits of using a footrest? Our desk footrest helps support better sitting posture, circulation in feet and legs, all while keeping your feet comfortable and relaxed. Use daily for lower body pain relief and support. Sure to become one of your favorite office desk accessories. How does this foot stool help with back pain? Without the use of a desk foot stool, your feet are planted on the flat surface leading you to sit hunched over. Using a foot rest under desk elevates your feet, supporting better alignment that keeps your back in a more comfortable position. What sets this footrest apart from all the others? It's made with premium memory foam that contours around your feet’s arches for better support, features a breathable and washable cover, and doubles as a rocker for active sitting. Plus, all of the components have been lab tested and certified safe. How to use a desk foot rest? To enhance your comfort while sitting for long periods of time, a footrest for under desk can be helpful. Simply place your feet on the foot rest pillow or flip the ergonomic foot rest over and use it as a rocker. Is this office foot rest washable? Yes, the Everlasting Comfort foot rest for under desk at work features a soft, removable cover that is machine washable. Toss the cover into your washing machine in cold water on the gentle cycle, and tumble dry with low or no heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable footrest for WFH and streaming downtime!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended! Footrest is comfortable for my foot size (13) men's and the Cool Gel memory foam is both supportive and cushion soft at the same time. The bottom non-slip micro beaded surface keeps the footrest from slipping around. The removable cover appears to be of high quality micro velour type material and is stated to be washable, however I have not needed to wash it as yet. When not in use the rest can be easily tucked or stored away. Provides tremendous elevated lower leg fatigue relief when seated for long work or gaming sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Put the foot rest under my desk - supports my feet and lower back really well. Material is very soft and memory foam does a great job of adapting to your feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable foot rest
reviews.reviewText: This foot rest had mainly positive reviews, but some negative ones. I can agree with the more positive reviews. I've been using this foot rest now for a few weeks and like the feel and comfort of it. I can't say it is relieving any pain because I didn't really have pain. It was more of being a short person who needed a place to put my feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving this cushion!
reviews.reviewText: I put off this purchase for far too long.I work from home 100%, and have slowly over time upgraded my office components to really make it a place of joy to work from.Having recently changed locales - I realized that the missing link was this item that had been in my shopping cart all the while.I am THRILLED that this product has lived up to its name and the hype. I no longer have lower back pain, I no longer have stains on the wall where my feet used to go (gross but you know what I'm talking about).The cushion is versatile and I love the fact that you can remove the outer liner and wash just like normal. The texture is soft and PERFECT for bare feet or with socks on. I don't use with shoes because that feels wrong (though I suppose you could.)Overall, a fantastic product that I should have purchased a long time ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Like to use under my knees to elevate them while reclined or as an arm rest

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy feet. Long term protection
reviews.reviewText: Gave these to my at home business family members. Sitting too long at a desk isn’t long term good for your body. With these, they can change angles which is very important. Both of them have used them now and are very pleased. They fit snug under the desk. They used the word… comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars once you buy one, you are never going back to not having one!
reviews.reviewText: I gotta say, these are so comfy! As someone who works from home, I sit on my computer for around 8 hours on most days, these definitely help keep my posture correct, they keep me from getting back pain, and they are just comfy to put my feet on overall. I told my girlfriend about it... so I let her use mine for a few days, and she was sold! She bought herself one, and has been loving it ever since. I got two of my friends on it too, we are a bunch of computer scientists who just need all the help we can get as we sit on our desk most days coding away.a bonus is that you can take off the cover for it, so you can put it in the washer to clean it every so often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cushy, but TOO cushy
reviews.reviewText: It's certainly soft and squishy, and the cover comes off for easy cleaning, but even just lightly resting my feet on it makes it squish too far for it to be ergonomic anymore. I might just need a taller one.

So, my legs are kinda shrimpy. The gaming chair I have is kinda tall. This food rest is comfortable and saves me the humiliation of dangling my feet off the chair like a kid. Bonus, it's actually really soft too and is very comfortable. Would purchase again if the need arises.
Muy cómodo justo lo que esperaba
Es muy cómodo para descansar los pies y no te cuelguen al momento de trabajar en el escritorio
